title: 'They put chains on our feet': Haitian migrant on experience at border
description: CNN's Melissa Bell speaks with some migrants deported back to Haiti after making the long and treacherous journey to the United States.

title: 'She deserves the same treatment:' Sisters of missing Indigenous woman want answers
description: Mary Johnson has been missing for almost a year. Two of her sisters wish there were more resources put towards finding her and feel that her case has been neglected because of her race.

title: A 60-year-old vice president played a pro soccer game. Now he's being investigated
description: It's not often that you'd find a country's leader on the soccer pitch. And it's even rarer as a professional, as Suriname's Vice President Ronnie Brunswijk finds himself at the advanced athletic age of 60.
